item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 11/14/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Button Display Limits on Messenger and WhatsApp: We’ve resolved an issue where exceeding the platform button limits on Messenger and WhatsApp caused display issues. Now, if the button count exceeds the limit, we will display only the maximum allowable number of buttons. Free Welcome Message and User Form: The welcome message and user form completion no longer count toward the monthly message quota.
